oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: UNICEF tour - New Zealand - 1972 - part 7
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part seven of a 1972 UNICEF fundraiser tour performance in New Zealand. Featuring Tex Ritter (host/performer), Rusty Greaves (performer), Ray Sanders (performer), and Tom T. Hall (performer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Rusty Greaves; Ray Sanders; Tom T. Hall
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Tex Ritter talks and introduces Rusty Graves -- (01:30) Rusty Greaves talks and introduces the first tune -- (02:06) She Taught Me How To Yodel (Rusty Greaves) -- (03:55) Greaves thanks the audience and introduces the next tune -- (04:45) A Pub With No Beer (Rusty Greaves) -- (07:03) Greaves talks about his family and New Zealand and introduces the next tune -- (08:35) There's A Gold Mine In The Sky (Rusty Greaves) -- (10:52) Ritter thanks Greaves and introduces Ray Sanders -- (12:18) Let's Blame It On Rosie (Ray Sanders) -- (14:19) Sanders talks about playing in Australia and introduces the next tune -- (14:38) Beer Drinkin' Music (Ray Sanders) -- (17:12) Sanders talks and introduces the next tune -- (17:33) All I Ever Need Is You (Ray Sanders) -- (19:40) Ritter thanks Sanders and introduces Tom T. Hall -- (22:24) Tom T. Hall thanks the audience -- (22:53) Ballad Of Forty Dollars (Tom T. Hall)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Greaves, Rusty (Entertainer); Ritter, Tex, 1905-1974; Sanders, Ray (Vocalist); Hall, Tom T.;
